column1: Kata Robata////Always a solid option in the area for robata
column5: and more. Â We had a variety of dishes
column6: but I'll recommend the lobster and crab ramen. Rich and flavorful with chunks of lobster and crabmeat
column7: I loved this dish so much I order plain noodles to go and boxed up leftover broth to eat for lunch at home the next day.
